nodes.text: Vormur were a species of wildflower native to the Outer Rim world of Mandalore. Vormur blooms possessed a pleasant fragrance, and it was not uncommon for Mandalorians to pick the flowers for their enjoyable scent.

Following her revival from years of carbonite freeze, Sintas Vel—the ex-wife of the reigning Mand'alor Boba Fett—stayed on Mandalore for a time while she recovered from the effects of hibernation sickness. Ghes Orade, the boyfriend of Vel's granddaughter Mirta Gev, brought a bouquet of vormur blooms to Vel when he came to visit. Though she was temporarily blind as a side effect from the carbonite, Vel enjoyed the vormur flowers' pleasant smell.
Vormur blooms were first introduced to the Star Wars universe in the Star Wars: Legacy of the Force novel, Revelation, written by author Karen Traviss and published February 26, 2008.
